query:
SELECT 
                   id as "id!: Uuid",
                   task_id as "task_id!: Uuid",
                   event_type as "event_type!: TaskHistoryEventType",
                   old_value,
                   new_value,
                   metadata,
                   created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
               FROM task_history
               WHERE task_id = $1
               ORDER BY created_at DESC
               LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
